skinspy.config.isBlocklistMode.tooltip:
ON - changes the skin to custom ONLY on servers with the tag
OFF - changes the skin to custom everywhere EXCEPT for servers with the tag
skinspy.config.serverTag.tooltip:
Allows you to determine the type of use of the mod on the server (depends on the blocklist).
This tag must be registered in the server settings in the list of servers
skinspy.config.skinName.tooltip: The name of the skin file from the 'skinspy' folder in the game 'config' folder (For example, "skinspy.png")
skinspy.config.capeName.tooltip:
API name of the cape available to you ('HIDE' = hide all capes)
List of all capes: https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Cape
skinspy.config.skinType.tooltip: Allows you to select the thickness of the skin's arms.
skinspy.response.getProfile.fail: An error occurred while getting profile information (list of capes). See console for details
skinspy.response.uploadSkin.fail: An error occurred while installing the skin. See console for details
skinspy.response.hideCape.fail: An error occurred while hiding the cape. See console for details
skinspy.response.showCape.fail: An error occurred while installing the cape. See console for details
skinspy.response.showCape.empty: The name of the cape is incorrect or you do not own it.
skinspy.info.request: SkinSpy: API request sent and waiting for response
